original: @ga   /gnod sbyin nag po'i bstod pa/

analyzed: @##/_/hum/_gnod sbyin nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/dar men

analyzed: ga sha sku la gsol/_/phyag g.yas gser gyi gri gug bsnams/_/chos 'khor

analyzed: kun dga' snying po la sogs pa'i/_/bla ma rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/_/dam

analyzed: tshhig bzang po rjes dgongs la/_/bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar/_/

translated: in accordance with the Dharma be accomplished.
